title: Viewport3D support in XAML with Windows 8.1 Metro app
body: There is no XAML support for 3D in windows Metro app. That would be very good if the XAML supporting Viewport3D or 3D elements for Metro app.

comments.body:
High level WinRT has no built-in 3d graphics support like WPF does.
There are a few ways to draw 3d shapes:
1. Create your own 3d library.
2. Use 3rd party managed 3d graphics library which is a wrapper around DirectX.
3. Use DirextX interop.
4. Use other tools like modelling software.
